availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George S. Jennings (Clermont County, Ohio, wool carder and farmer)

body.p: Clermont County, Ohio, wool carder and farmer. Illinois native. Son of Suphronia Jennings. Student in Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Wool carder for Joseph Dixson in Clermont County in 1860. Farmer in Morgan County, Illinois, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, District 2, p. 114B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Clermont County, Washington Township,Town of Moscow, p. 465.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Morgan County, IL, July 1863, p. 224.
